AAH.caption: element_id
AAH.doc: The Group ID you want to download an image of
AAH.name: element_id

AAK.caption: File Name
AAK.doc: File name of downloaded file. Don't give space between file name.
AAK.name: filename

AAf.caption: Scale
AAf.doc: Set a numeric value greater than 0 to scale the image. For example, 2 will double the resolution, 3 will triple it, and so on. Higher values produce finer details but increase the file size. Optional
AAf.name: scale
